title: Bank of Canada Orders Payments Firm XTM to Stop as Millions Go Missing
description: The Bank of Canada issued an order to temporarily stop financial technology company XTM Inc. from handling retail payments, alleging it failed to safeguard client funds and caused a “significant shortfall.”
content: The Bank of Canada issued an order to temporarily stop financial technology company XTM Inc. from handling retail payments, alleging it failed to safeguard client funds and caused a “significant shortfall.”
